trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of attribute objects that control how the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> serializes and deserializes SOAP methods.
trans-unit.target: Representa a una colección de objetos de atributos que controlan el modo en que <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> serializa y deserializa los métodos SOAP.

trans-unit.source: Creating a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> is part of a process that overrides the default way the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes class instances.
trans-unit.target: Crear un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> forma parte de un proceso que reemplaza el valor predeterminado sentido <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializa instancias de clase.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you want to serialize an object that is created from a DLL that has an inaccessible source.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, imagine que desea serializar un objeto que se crea a partir de un archivo DLL que tiene un origen inaccesible.

trans-unit.source: By using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class, you can augment or otherwise control how the object is serialized.
trans-unit.target: Mediante el uso de la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> (clase), puede aumentar o controlar cómo se serializa el objeto.

trans-unit.source: The members of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> class correspond directly to a family of attribute classes that control serialization.
trans-unit.target: Los miembros de la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> clase se corresponden directamente con una familia de clases de atributos que controlan la serialización.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A> property must be set to a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, which allows you to override serialization of a field or property by instructing the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to serialize the property value as an encoded SOAP attribute.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A> propiedad debe establecerse en un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute>, que le permite reemplazar la serialización de un campo o propiedad que indica la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> para serializar el valor de propiedad como un atributo SOAP codificado.

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of attributes that control encoded SOAP serialization, see [Attributes That Control Encoded SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-encoded-soap-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener una lista completa de atributos que controlan la serialización SOAP codificada, vea [atributos que controlan la serialización SOAP codificada](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-encoded-soap-serialization.md).

trans-unit.source: For more details about adding an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> class to an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class, see the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información acerca de cómo agregar una instancia de la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> clase a una instancia de la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> de clases, consulte la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> Introducción a la clase.

trans-unit.source: The following example serializes a class named `Group`.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se serializa una clase denominada `Group`.

trans-unit.source: The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden.
trans-unit.target: La serialización de la `GroupName` y `IgnoreThis` campos y los miembros de la `GroupType` se reemplaza la enumeración.

trans-unit.source: In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> is created with the appropriate property set and added to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: En el `CreateOverrideSerializer` método, un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> está creada y cada miembro reemplazado o enumeración, un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> se crea con la correspondiente propiedad establecida y agregada a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> is created using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>, and that <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> is used to create the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> that overrides the default serialization.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> se crea utilizando el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>y que <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> se utiliza para crear el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> que invalida la serialización predeterminada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" />.

trans-unit.source: For each member or class instance whose serialization is being overridden, you must create a new <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>.
trans-unit.target: Para cada instancia de miembro o clase cuya serialización se reemplace, debe crear una nueva <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>.

trans-unit.source: Set the properties for the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> as appropriate to the member or object, then add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> to an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class.
trans-unit.target: Establecer las propiedades de la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> como apropiados para el miembro u objeto, a continuación, agregue el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> a una instancia de la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> clase.

trans-unit.source: The following example serializes a class named `Group`.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se serializa una clase denominada `Group`.

trans-unit.source: The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden.
trans-unit.target: La serialización de la `GroupName` y `IgnoreThis` campos y los miembros de la `GroupType` se reemplaza la enumeración.

trans-unit.source: In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> is created with the appropriate property set and added to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: En el `CreateOverrideSerializer` método, un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> está creada y cada miembro reemplazado o enumeración, un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> se crea con la correspondiente propiedad establecida y agregada a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> is created using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>, and that <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> is used to create the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> that overrides the default serialization.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> se crea utilizando el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>y que <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> se utiliza para crear el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> que invalida la serialización predeterminada.

trans-unit.source: Any object that implements the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ICustomAttributeProvider" /> interface, such as the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que implementa la interfaz <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ICustomAttributeProvider" />, como la clase <see cref="T:System.Type" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> class using the specified custom type.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes" /> utilizando el tipo personalizado especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute" /> to override.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute" /> que se va a reemplazar.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute" /> that overrides the behavior of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> when the member is serialized.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute" /> que reemplaza el comportamiento del <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> cuando se serializa el miembro.

trans-unit.source: By default, if no attribute is applied to a public field or public read/write property, it is serialized as an XML element.
trans-unit.target: De forma predeterminada, si no se aplica ningún atributo a un campo público o una propiedad de lectura y escritura públicas, se serializa como un elemento XML.

trans-unit.source: You can also instruct the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to serialize a member as an encoded SOAP XML attribute by applying a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> to the field or property.
trans-unit.target: También puede indicar la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> para serializar un miembro como un atributo XML SOAP codificado aplicando un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> al campo o propiedad.

trans-unit.source: (The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> must be created with an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> in order to serialize an object as an encoded SOAP XML stream.)
trans-unit.target: (El <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> deben crearse con una <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> con el fin de serializar un objeto como una secuencia XML SOAP codificada.)

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A> property allows you to override the serialization controlled by applying a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> to the member.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapAttribute%2A> propiedad le permite reemplazar la serialización controlada aplicando un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute> al miembro.

trans-unit.source: For more details on this process, see the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más detalles sobre este proceso, consulte la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> Introducción a la clase.

trans-unit.source: The following example serializes a class named `Group`.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se serializa una clase denominada `Group`.

trans-unit.source: The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden.
trans-unit.target: La serialización de la `GroupName` y `IgnoreThis` campos y los miembros de la `GroupType` se reemplaza la enumeración.

trans-unit.source: In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> is created with the appropriate property set and added to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: En el `CreateOverrideSerializer` método, un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> está creada y cada miembro reemplazado o enumeración, un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> se crea con la correspondiente propiedad establecida y agregada a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> is created using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>, and that <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> is used to create the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> that overrides the default serialization.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> se crea utilizando el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>y que <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> se utiliza para crear el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> que invalida la serialización predeterminada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default value of an XML element or attribute.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el valor predeterminado de un elemento o atributo XML.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the default value of an XML element or attribute.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que representa el valor predeterminado de un elemento o atributo XML.

trans-unit.source: The default value of a member can be set by applying a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute> attribute to the member.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado de un miembro puede establecerse aplicando un <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute> al miembro de atributo.

trans-unit.source: If the member is being serialized as an encoded SOAP message, you can change the default value by creating a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>, setting its <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute.Value%2A> property, and setting the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapDefaultValue%2A> property to the object.
trans-unit.target: Si el miembro se serializa como un mensaje SOAP codificado, puede cambiar el valor predeterminado al crear un nuevo <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>, y establece su <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute.Value%2A> propiedad y estableciendo el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapDefaultValue%2A> propiedad al objeto.

trans-unit.source: Add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> to a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: Agregar el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> a una <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.

trans-unit.source: For more details, see the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> general sobre la clase.

trans-unit.source: The following example serializes a class named `Group` that includes a field named `GroupName`.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se serializa una clase denominada `Group` que incluye un campo denominado `GroupName`.

trans-unit.source: The default value is set with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute> to ".NET".
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado se establece con el <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute> en ". NET".

trans-unit.source: By either not setting the field, or by setting it to ".NET", the value is not serialized (because the default value is already known).
trans-unit.target: Si no se establece el campo, o si se establece en ". NET", no se serializa el valor (porque ya se conoce el valor predeterminado).

trans-unit.source: The sample also overrides the default value in the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, which is called by the `SerializeOverride` method.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo también invalida el valor predeterminado en el `CreateOverrideSerializer` método, que es llamado por el `SerializeOverride` método.

trans-unit.source: The example calls both methods, `SerializeOriginal` and `SerializeOverride`, and sets the same value (".NET") for the `GroupName` field.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo se llama a los métodos `SerializeOriginal` y `SerializeOverride`y establece el mismo valor (". NET") para el `GroupName` campo.

trans-unit.source: Because of the override, the value is serialized only when calling the `SerializeOverride` method.
trans-unit.target: Debido a la invalidación, el valor se serializa únicamente cuando se llama el `SerializeOverride` método.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute" /> to override.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute" /> que se va a reemplazar.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute" /> to override.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute" /> que se va a reemplazar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> is used to control the serialization of a class member as an XML element.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> se utiliza para controlar la serialización de un miembro de clase como un elemento XML.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapElement%2A> property to a new <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> to override the serialization of a class member as an XML element by creating a new <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> and assigning it to the property.
trans-unit.target: Establecer el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapElement%2A> propiedad a una nueva <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> para reemplazar la serialización de un miembro de clase como un elemento XML mediante la creación de un nuevo <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> y asignar a la propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Then add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> to a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: A continuación, agregue el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> a una <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> with the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>, then construct an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> with the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>.
trans-unit.target: Crear un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> con el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>, a continuación, construya un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> con el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> general sobre la clase.

trans-unit.source: The following example serializes a class named `Transportation`.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se serializa una clase denominada `Transportation`.

trans-unit.source: The serialization of the `Vehicle` field is overridden.
trans-unit.target: La serialización de la `Vehicle` se invalida el campo.

trans-unit.source: In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> is created with the appropriate property set and added to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: En el `CreateOverrideSerializer` método, un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> está creada y cada miembro reemplazado o enumeración, un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> se crea con la correspondiente propiedad establecida y agregada a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> is created using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>, and that <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> is used to create the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> that overrides the default serialization.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> se crea utilizando el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>y que <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> se utiliza para crear el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> que invalida la serialización predeterminada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that specifies how the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> serializes a SOAP enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un objeto que especifica el modo en que <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> serializa una enumeración SOAP.

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies how the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> serializes an enumeration member.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que especifica el modo en que <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> serializa un miembro de enumeración.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute> is used to control the serialization of an enumeration member.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute> se utiliza para controlar la serialización de un miembro de enumeración.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapEnum%2A> property to a new <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute> to override the serialization of such a member.
trans-unit.target: Establecer el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapEnum%2A> propiedad a una nueva <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute> para reemplazar la serialización de un miembro de este tipo.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> general sobre la clase.

trans-unit.source: The following example serializes two classes named `Food` and `FoodType`.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente, se serializa dos clases denominadas `Food` y `FoodType`.

trans-unit.source: The `FoodType` class contains two enumerations that are overridden, and for each enumeration, the example creates a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute> that it assigns to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapEnum%2A> property of a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>.
trans-unit.target: El `FoodType` clase contiene dos enumeraciones que se reemplazan y, para cada enumeración, el ejemplo se crea un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute> que se asigna a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapEnum%2A> propiedad de un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>.

trans-unit.source: The example then adds the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> to a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>, which is used to create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo, a continuación, agrega el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> a una <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>, que se usa para crear un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> serializes a public field or property as encoded SOAP XML.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un valor que especifica si <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> serializa o no un campo público o una propiedad pública como XML SOAP codificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> must not serialize the field or property; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si el objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> no debe serializar ni el campo ni la propiedad; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: By default, all public fields and public read/write properties are serialized by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: De forma predeterminada, se serializan todos los campos públicos y propiedades públicas de lectura/escritura por la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.

trans-unit.source: That is, the value of each public field or property is persisted as an XML element or XML attribute in an XML document.
trans-unit.target: Es decir, el valor de cada campo público o una propiedad se almacena como un atributo XML en un documento XML o un elemento XML.

trans-unit.source: To override the default serialization of a field or property, create a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, and set its <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapIgnore%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para reemplazar la serialización predeterminada de un campo o propiedad, cree un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>y establezca su <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapIgnore%2A> propiedad `true`.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Add%2A> method to add the object to a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> and specify the type of the object that contains the field or property to ignore and the name of the field or property to ignore.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides.Add%2A> método para agregar el objeto a un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> y especificar el tipo del objeto que contiene el campo o propiedad para pasar por alto y el nombre del campo o propiedad que debe omitirse.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute> is applied to a field or property, the field or property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Si un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute> se aplica a un campo o propiedad, se omite el campo o propiedad.

trans-unit.source: However you can override that behavior by creating a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, setting its <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapIgnore%2A> property to `false`, and adding it to a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>, specifying the type of the object that contains the field or property and the name of the field or property.
trans-unit.target: Sin embargo puede invalidar este comportamiento mediante la creación de un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>, y establece su <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapIgnore%2A> propiedad `false`y agregarla a un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>, especificando el tipo del objeto que contiene el campo o propiedad y el nombre del campo o propiedad.

trans-unit.source: The following example serializes a class named `Group`.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se serializa una clase denominada `Group`.

trans-unit.source: The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden.
trans-unit.target: La serialización de la `GroupName` y `IgnoreThis` campos y los miembros de la `GroupType` se reemplaza la enumeración.

trans-unit.source: In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> is created with the appropriate property set and added to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: En el `CreateOverrideSerializer` método, un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> está creada y cada miembro reemplazado o enumeración, un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> se crea con la correspondiente propiedad establecida y agregada a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> is created using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>, and that <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> is used to create the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> that overrides the default serialization.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> se crea utilizando el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>y que <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> se utiliza para crear el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> que invalida la serialización predeterminada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that instructs the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> how to serialize an object type into encoded SOAP XML.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un objeto que indica al <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> cómo serializar un tipo de objeto en XML SOAP codificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute" /> that either overrides a <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute" /> applied to a class declaration, or is applied to a class declaration.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute" /> que reemplaza un atributo <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute" /> aplicado a una declaración de clase o que se aplica a una declaración de clase.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute> can be used to control the XML stream generated by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute> puede usarse para controlar la secuencia XML generada por el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapType%2A> property to a new <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute> to control the schema for the XML that is generated when a class is serialized.
trans-unit.target: Establecer el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapType%2A> propiedad a una nueva <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute> para controlar el esquema para el XML que se genera cuando se serializa una clase.

trans-unit.source: The following example serializes a class named `Group`.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se serializa una clase denominada `Group`.

trans-unit.source: The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden.
trans-unit.target: La serialización de la `GroupName` y `IgnoreThis` campos y los miembros de la `GroupType` se reemplaza la enumeración.

trans-unit.source: In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> is created with the appropriate property set and added to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: En el `CreateOverrideSerializer` método, un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> está creada y cada miembro reemplazado o enumeración, un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> se crea con la correspondiente propiedad establecida y agregada a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> is created using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>, and that <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> is used to create the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> that overrides the default serialization.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> se crea utilizando el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>y que <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> se utiliza para crear el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> que invalida la serialización predeterminada.
